The property listing data and information are for the personal, non commercial use of consumers having a good faith interest in purchasing or leasing listed properties of the type displayed to them and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties which such consumers may have a good faith interest in purchasing or leasing. MLS Property Information Network, Inc. and its subscribers disclaim any and all representations and warranties as to the accuracy of the property listing data and information set forth herein.

The MLS listing information displayed is deemed reliable, but is not guaranteed accurate by the MLS.

CJL Rentals & Property Management Co., Inc.
Douglas Elliman Real Estate - The Sarkis Team
Keller Williams Realty Boston-Metro | Back Bay

description: Step into this spacious and inviting 1 bed, 1 bath condo, complete with an oversized backyard-perfect for city living. Upon entering through the front gate and private entrance, you'll find a bright, open-concept floor plan that welcomes you home. This urban retreat boasts stainless steel appliances, white shaker cabinets, hardwood floors throughout, and an exclusive fenced yard. The generously sized bedroom easily accommodates a king-sized bed and provides room for a home office if needed. The seamless flow from the family room to the kitchen makes entertaining a breeze. Ideal for commuters, this condo is conveniently located near the T, public transportation, major highways, and just ½ mile from Carson and M Street Beach. Low condo fees and a pet-friendly association are the cherry on top for this perfect southie condo!

telephoneConsumerProtectionActDisclaimer.text: By pressing Contact agent, you agree that Zillow Group and its affiliates, and real estate professionals may call/text you about your inquiry, which may involve use of automated means and prerecorded/artificial voices. You don’t need to consent as a condition of buying any property, goods or services. Message/data rates may apply. You also agree to our Terms of Use. Zillow does not endorse any real estate professionals. We may share information about your recent and future site activity with your agent to help them understand what you’re looking for in a home.

textAttributes.tooltipText: “Real estate professionals” includes the real estate agents and brokers, mortgage lenders and loan officers, property managers, and other professionals you interact with through Zillow. Zillow Premier Agent is an advertising program that helps connect customers to local real estate professionals. Zillow Premier Agent partners are paid advertisers and are not affiliated with Zillow, Inc. brokerage or any of its affiliates.
